General.Name: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited
General.Description: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. The company offers canned and pouched sweet corn products; fresh vegetable and fruit products; and commercial seeds, as well as breeds and distributes corn seeds. It also exports its products. Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.
General.Address: The Ruamjaipattana Foundation Building, Pathum Thani, Thailand, 12120

2.Name: Mr. Monchai  Pongstabadee
